resources.string: Login automatically when connected to supported Wi-Fi networks
Try to reconnect to Wi-Fi network automatically when Wi-Fi signal is lost or connection is reset. (Android < 10)
Prevents leaking traffic to mobile network or VPN. (Android ≥ 5)
Check Internet connection every 10 seconds and restart connection on error.
Use white icons on Android older than 5.0 and colored icons on Android 5.0 and newer (not always supported).
Lock successful connection notification (notification will remain while Wi-Fi is connected)
I will be able to inform you in case of problems with application.
Number of seconds to wait for IP address assignment. If 0 is set, application will wait until device disconnects from the network (default: 0).
Check for updates on application start
Check for new application version on developer website
Branches differ by functionality and update frequency. Tap here to see more or select a branch.
New versions will be displayed here when published.
You can connect here if this application is ignoring Wi-Fi state
Press here to view logs of previous runs.
Even if network name is unknown
Unknown redirect. Trying to detect algorithm…
Switching to another algorithm: %s (this is not an error)

device is not registered in the network\n Please, open http://wi-fi.ru and register with your phone number to get SMS with further instructions. It is only required the first time, after that application will work normally.\n Disclaimer: This application developer has nothing to do with registration. Registration is required by MaximaTelecom ISP (http://maximatelecom.ru).
Login and password are required to connect to this network. Please check \"MAInet (wifi.mai.ru)\" in \"Connection settings\" menu.
Login and password are required to connect to this network. Please check \"bmstu_lb (lbpfs.bmstu.ru)\" in \"Connection settings\" menu.
server does not respond or responds with error
expected redirect to another algorithm, received redirect to MosMetroV3 (infinite loop)
Click to get details or retry
First Pull-request, Gradle migration, English translation

Starting with Android 6.0, you need to add this application to the energy saving whitelist, so that it can access the network in the background. Otherwise, background process may completely freeze due to the new energy saving policy.
Bind background process to notification to protect it from being killed. If you disable this option, background process will be killed even if you simply open and close the app window.
Number of seconds to wait for server answer. If 0 is set, application will wait until connection error is caught (default: 5).
This function seems to be unsupported on your device. Sorry :(
Looks like you don\'t have any apps suitable for this link.
A value between -2 and 2 that affects the priority of all notifications. (default: 0)
failed to save log to file
Amount of seconds between internet checks. Affects traffic and power consumption.
Range of random delays applied for every request.
Set the User-Agent HTTP header to disguise this app as browser. The random one is chosen by default.
Connection log may contain sensitive data such as your MAC-address or phone number. Do not send this file to public chats or social networks.
Slow down the connection process by adding random delays between HTTP-requests to avoid possible bans from the provider.
Start manual connection directly from launcher
Write log messages to system log to allow debugging in case of crash.
Automatically send crash reports to application developer.
This algorithm was used during the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Moscow and St. Petersburg. It is currently disabled, so most likely this setting will not affect anything.
This algorithm is required to connect to MAInet_public — public Wi-Fi network of Moscow Aviation Institute
This algorithm is required to connect to bmstu_lb — public Wi-Fi network of Bauman Moscow State Technical University.
Log will be sent along with Sentry reports in case of crash.

Android 9+ requires location access in order to get the name of the Wi-Fi network. Without this permission app will not start automatically, but you can still connect manually through main menu or shortcuts.
Extension of MosMetroV2 that uses headless browser and JavaScript instead of hardcoded HTTP requests. Slower but safer if the provider would start to take action against this app\'s users again.
This algorithm is less stable than MosMetroV2. It may freeze, crash or just connect very slowly. Do you really want to enable it?
If you are seeing \"Sign into Wi-Fi network\" in your notifications, or Android thinks that internet is not available even if it actually is, this option might help.
Send conditional automated reports. Conditions change in every update and are targeting new functions and fixes. Reports contain last log, app version and some information about system and device.
Enable this option if the application does not automatically start when the device connects to Wi-Fi
Android 9+ requires location access in order to get the name of the Wi-Fi network. Without this permission app will not start automatically even if this option is enabled.

Android 9+ requires background location access or persistent notification in order to be able to get the name of the Wi-Fi network. Without this permission app will not start automatically when this option is disabled.
Continue to monitor internet connection after successful manual connection until disconnecting from Wi-Fi. It is required for midsession detection.
Always use custom DNS client instead of the system one
Unable to install the update. Please try \"Download\" instead of \"Install\"
Show notification about every 50-th successful connection and ask for a donation
I spend a lot of time to save yours. If you want, you can support the project. Click on this notification to find out more :)
You need to have root permissions or a PC to apply this fix. This is only needed to be done once.

Android does not want to use some Wi-Fi networks because of incorrect responses from the provider. Enable this option to change the system-wide connectivity check URL to a more reliable one. [Requires root or PC]
Midsession detected! Tap >here< if Android doesn\'t want to use the Wi-Fi network.
Too slow? Tap >here< to disable MosMetroV2WV and switch to a faster MosMetroV2 algorithm
Unable to handle midsession. If you see this message too often, tap >here< to disable this function.
VPN detected! Some VPN apps or traffic filters may interfere with this app even if it was added to blacklist. Please disable the VPN and try again.
Perform quick DNS check in every unknown Wi-Fi network in attempt to find signs of any supported algorithm.
App will collect anonymous metrics about connections. In addition to fully internal metrics (app version, algorithm, etc.) reports may include OS version and the name of the Wi-Fi network.
